content.p: Welcome to our architecture end of year show Welcome to exhibit!24 It's time to celebrate the project work of our Architecture and Built Environment students. Here you'll find a selection of the projects of students on the BArch Architecture (years 1 and 3) and the MArch Architecture (years 5 and 6) courses, along with the work of our postgraduate MArch students. You can view the exhibition in person from Thursday 20 June to Friday 19 July 2024 (9am-4pm) across the Architecture and Built Environment Department. Projects and designs from years one and three of our BArch Architecture course. Projects and designs from years five and six of our Architecture Part 2 course. Projects and designs from students in our postgraduate MArch courses. See artwork from previous years. View architecture courses. See where Architecture and Built Environment students learn. See what graduates do now.
